input.sentences: [male] received an award from the military for his service to his country .
a photo was taken with his wife and military officers .
he was congratulated by an important person .
the audience gave [male] a standing ovation .
output.sentences: This gentleman looks pleased to have recieved this plaque for his distinguished military service.
The officers posed for pictures with their wives, after being commemorated.
This person, like so many others at the gala, were anxious to congratulate all the honored military guests.
This wife of a male recipient is being congratulaed.
One male recipient, in particular, got a standing ovation.
